text: In the Heights is a 2021 American musical drama movie based on the stage musical of the same name by Quiara Alegr√≠a Hudes and Lin-Manuel Miranda. It is directed by Jon M. Chu. It stars Anthony Ramos, Corey Hawkins, Leslie Grace, Melissa Barrera, Olga Merediz, Daphne Rubin-Vega, Gregory Diaz IV, and Jimmy Smits. ==References== Category:2021 musical movies Category:2021 drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Jon M.
